entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Estevan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Estevan Airport 05:45 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -7.4°C
Wind: E 52 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending early this afternoon then snow and blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
